front.title: Usage/Volume Tier Feedback Use Case for Congestion Exposure

abstract.t: As requested in the Beijing meeting, this is an individual draft thatexpands on the usage tier/volume use case from [McDysan]. Thefeedback recorded in the Beijing conex meeting minutes was that anumber of people were potentially interested in this use case, butthat it was out of scope of the current charter, and/or couldpotentially be built out of the conex abstract mechanism.
